sentences.sContent: Now, if only these phones were smart enough to do the dishes.
sentences.sCn: 现在要是这些电话有足够的智能来清洗餐具该有多好。

sentences.sContent: A batch of things to do in an hour today may look like this: Clean your desk / answer today’s emails / do the dishes / make three calls / write a grocery shopping list for tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 今天在一个小时里的要做的一批事情就像是这样：清理你的桌子/回复今天的邮件/洗餐具/打三个电话/写明天去食品店的购物清单
